short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Help you complete immersive language learning.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
一个语言学习工具，帮助你在实践中学习。
1. 在 YouTube 中学习
2. 语境理解：学习单词在句子中的含义。
3. 自定义 Prompt：定制你的学习方法
4. 图片记忆：显示单词相关的图片帮助记忆。
5. Anki 集成：轻松地将单词、发音、短语和句子添加到 Anki 中。
6. 多模型支持：GPT-4、Ollama、Claude 等模型可选，还支持免费在线词典
7. 多语言支持
8. 1 对 1 客服

Scouter 旨在弥合理论与实践之间的差距，帮助学习者在实践环境中语言知识。

💬 加入我们的 Discord 社区：https://discord.com/invite/7Pm3vmz87n

A language learning tool to help you learn through practice.
1. Learning in YouTube
2. Contextual understanding: Learn the meaning of words in sentences.
3. Custom Prompt: Customize your learning approach.
4. Picture memory: Display pictures related to words to aid in memory retention.
5. Anki Integration: Easily add words, pronunciations, phrases, and sentences to Anki flashcards.
6. Multi-model Support: GPT-4, Ollama, Claude and other models are available, and free online dictionaries are also supported.
7. Multilingual support. 
8. One-on-one customer service

Our philosophy: Scouter aims to bridge the gap between theory and practice, helping learners apply language knowledge in real-world situations.

💬 Join our Discord community: https://discord.com/invite/7Pm3vmz87n
